title: To your health
creator_contributor_role: Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films, production company

description: Referring to the many varied opinions about alcohol, the film sets out to deal only with facts. The distribution and fate of the drug in the body is shown, and its anaesthetic properties affecting reasoning, inhibitions, memory, the special senses and muscular co-ordination described.
